name: Go No Go
instructions: On the following screen, you will see instructions for the [b]Go-NoGo Fade[/b] cognitive task.
You will see pictures of mountains and cities - one at a time.
When you see a [b]CITY[/b] picture, [b]press the button as quickly as you can[/b]
When you see a [b]MOUNTAIN[/b] picture, [b] DO NOT PRESS the button[/b]
